title: Durability is the Most Important Performance Marker of the Pogačar Era … But Nobody Knows How to Train It
content:
'When you see what Pogačar does, it’s obvious we have to try to understand it.' The WorldTour is racing to unlock the secrets of durability, the kingmaker of modern racing.

Read the full article at Durability is the Most Important Performance Marker of the Pogačar Era … But Nobody Knows How to Train It on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
